cards.gotag: GoTag is a game for android using google maps that allows users to login and play a city-wide game of tag!
cards.gotag_2: Unfortuneatly this application will not be release just due to shear practicality of it.
cards.gotag_3: I utilized PHP, json, databases, google maps api, and TOO MANY asynctasks to accomplish this project.
cards.unity: I have just started to work in unity developing game physics and different styles of games.
cards.unity_2: Utilizing tutorials to teach myself the inner workings of the unity engine.
cards.unity_3: The images link to the resorces I looked at.
